continuum-skin-desc:
Bɔmi 2 Continuum niŋgbuna
 
* 11- monobook taɣibu din daa kana la daa mali nina polo taɣibu pam ni di zaŋ tum tuma. 

*  Continuum daa mɛ mi pahi WMF [[mw:Desktop Improvements]] tumanima .
prefs-continuum-enable-continuum-1-help: Yuma din be tooni kanna, ti nyɛla ban yɛn kpaŋsiri continuum nahiŋgbana ŋɔ. Continuum fali ŋɔ ni che ka a tooi nyari yɛlikura zaŋ kpa continuum (as of December 19). A yi bɔri ni a deei baŋsim zaŋ kpa bee ninneesim, nyin yoomi [[mw:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
continuum-opt-out: Yihi ŋa labisi din di be shɛm ni
continuum-opt-out-tooltip: Taɣimi a seetibu n-labisi din di pun be shɛm ni (legacy Victor)
continuum-language-button-aria-label: Kpemi lahabali bali sheli ni. Din be {{PLURAL:$1|$1 Balli |$1 Bala}}
continuum-no-language-button-aria-label: Lala atikili ŋɔ maa kuli bela lala zuliya ŋɔ ni ko. Che lala atikili ŋɔ kpe zuliya shɛŋa m-pahi
continuum-anon-user-menu-pages: Sabbu yaɣa zaŋ ti mali niŋ nima ban yi maliniŋ kpanjɔri ni
continuum-anon-user-menu-pages-label: Bɔhima pam pahi zaŋ jɛndi maliniŋ
continuum-toc-collapsible-button-label: Cham gili yaɣayaɣa ŋan be teebuli maa puuni
continuum-feature-custom-font-size-exclu: Lahabali Kɔliguŋɔ zoo mali sabbu din pɔra
continuum-prefs-limited-width: Yoomi soli din dii bɛ galisi yaɣili maa
continuum-prefs-limited-width-help: Yoomi soli din dii bɛ galisi maa din yɛn sɔŋ ka karimbu tooi kpaŋsi
empty-language-selector-body: Paaji maa yaɣa maa bɛ saɣi dee zuliya nima zaa
continuum-toc-unpinned-popup: Yaɣayaɣa teebuli pubu pubu nyɛla din yihi shɛli n tahi na kpe.
continuum-page-tools-unpinned-popup: Tuma binyahiri kpanjɔɣu maa nyɛla din yi kpe
continuum-main-menu-unpinned-popup: Maŋmaŋa nyɛla bɛni. yihi shɛli kpe
continuum-beta-preview-description: Nyami continuum  nahiŋgbana pala ŋɔ yɔmyɔm
